price: 81. Wuxuu (Alle) idin tusiyaa Calaamooyin- kiisa, ee middee baa Calaamooyinka Alle beenineysaan?
arabic: وَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ فَأَيَّ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ تُنكِرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayurīkum āyātihi fa-ayya āyāti al-lahi tunkirūna
